app.title: ZeroLaunch-rs
app.loading_icons: Currently loading program icons in background...
app.semantic_fallback_ai_disabled: Semantic search selected, but AI is disabled (lite build). Fell back to standard matching
app.semantic_fallback_model_missing: Model weights not found. Fell back to standard matching

notifications.close_game_mode_first: Please disable game mode before retrying shortcut registration.
notifications.shortcut_register_failed: Failed to register shortcut. Please check the log.
notifications.game_mode_enabled: Game mode enabled. Global shortcuts disabled.
notifications.game_mode_disabled: Game mode disabled. Global shortcuts enabled.
notifications.already_running: zerolaunch-rs is already running. Do not run multiple instances.

builtin.toggle_game_mode_desc: Toggle game mode to disable or enable shortcuts

parameter.hint: Press Enter to confirm this argument, or press Esc to cancel.

ui_config.overall_background_color: Overall background color (for both search and result bars)
ui_config.search_bar_status_bar_background: Search bar and status bar background color
ui_config.dark_mode_tooltip: Overall background color: rgba(31, 31, 31, 1), Highlight color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 0.8), Font color: #A6A6A6
ui_config.search_bar_font_size: Search bar font size (percentage of line height)
ui_config.font_size_tooltip: Value: [5, 100], unit %: 80% means the font height is 80% of the search bar height
ui_config.search_bar_animation_tooltip: When enabled, the search bar will have a gradient animation effect when typing or deleting characters
ui_config.result_bar_font_size: Result bar font size (percentage of line height)
ui_config.result_font_size_tooltip: Value: [5, 100], unit %: 80% means the font height is 80% of the result item height
ui_config.footer_font_size: Footer font size (percentage of line height)
ui_config.footer_font_size_tooltip: Value: [5, 100], unit %: 80% means the font height is 80% of the footer height
ui_config.background_size_tooltip: 'cover': Scale the image to completely cover the element area, maintaining aspect ratio; 'contain:' Scale the image to be fully visible within the element, maintaining aspect ratio; 'auto': Use the original image size
ui_config.background_opacity_tooltip: Value range: [0, 1]. 1 means fully opaque, 0 means fully transparent
ui_config.calculate_dominant_color: Calculate dominant color of an image
ui_config.dominant_color_tooltip: If you don't know how to choose the highlight color for the result bar, you can use this function to calculate the dominant color of the background image
ui_config.dominant_color_result: The dominant color of this image is: {color}
ui_config.vertical_position_tooltip: 0 means at the top of the screen, 1 means at the bottom, 0.5 means in the exact center
ui_config.px_unit_tooltip: Unit px: the smallest unit of a digital image, the basic point of screen display
ui_config.system_radius_disabled: Cannot change corner radius when using system radius

icon_management.enable_online_icon_loading: Enable online loading of webpage icons
icon_management.online_icon_tooltip: When enabled, it can load icons for URLs, which will replace the default icon upon successful retrieval
icon_management.icon_cache_tooltip: Saves a local copy of the icon for each program to speed up icon loading
icon_management.icon_cache_disabled_warning: This feature is only available when icon cache is enabled
icon_management.refresh_note: Please enable icon cache! After updating an icon, please refresh the program database manually. The new icon will appear correctly after a successful refresh.

program_index.drag_drop_tooltip: Drag and drop files and folders to add search paths
program_index.search_depth_tooltip: Search depth of 2 means: search all files in current folder and all files in next level subfolders
program_index.symlink_mode_tooltip: ExplicitOnly: Only process symlinks with .symlink extension; Auto: Automatically detect and process all symlinks
program_index.max_symlink_depth_tooltip: Maximum symlink resolution depth to prevent circular references. Default is 4
program_index.select_or_add_path: Please select or add a path to configure
program_index.enter_target_path: Please enter or select target path
program_index.search_algorithm_tooltip: Standard: Carefully designed by the author, high accuracy & fault tolerance; Skim: A popular fuzzy matching algorithm; LaunchyQT: A port of the LaunchyQT algorithm; Semantic: Uses embedding model for meaning-based match (experimental, slower)
program_index.lru_cache_tooltip: Caches recent search results to greatly reduce latency, but dynamic weight updates won't show immediately.
program_index.lru_cache_description: When the LRU search cache is enabled, launch weight changes are not reflected instantly, but search latency can drop to about 0.01 ms. Recommended when using semantic search.
program_index.path_pattern_updated: Pattern for path {path} has been updated
program_index.file_pattern_exists: File pattern '{pattern}' already exists for path: {path}
program_index.unsupported_path_type: Unsupported path type or missing information: {path}
program_index.semantic_search_intro: Semantic search powered by EmbeddingGemma-300m for an unparalleled search experience.
program_index.semantic_tip_model: You need to download the model separately to the specified directory.
program_index.semantic_tip_description: Providing richer description information helps the model deliver more accurate functional search.
program_index.semantic_tip_performance: When enabled, initialization and database updates may use the GPU and significantly increase loading time.
program_index.enable_sorting_tooltip: When disabled, search results will only be sorted by match score, ignoring usage habits
program_index.history_weight_description: Effect: Adjusts ranking based on historical total launch count. Higher values favor frequently used programs. Recommended range: 0.5-1.5. Do not modify unless you understand. See code: program_ranker.rs.
program_index.recent_habit_weight_description: Effect: Adjusts ranking based on launch frequency within last 7 days. Higher values favor recently used programs. Recommended range: 1.0-3.0. Do not modify unless you understand. See code: program_ranker.rs.
program_index.temporal_weight_description: Effect: Adjusts ranking based on time since last launch (shorter = higher score). Higher values favor recently launched programs. Recommended range: 0.3-1.0. Do not modify unless you understand. See code: program_ranker.rs.
program_index.query_affinity_weight_description: Effect: Adjusts ranking based on association between search term and program. Higher values favor programs frequently launched under specific keywords. Recommended range: 3.0-7.0. Do not modify unless you understand. See code: program_ranker.rs.
program_index.query_affinity_time_decay_description: Effect: Controls decay speed of query affinity over time. Smaller values make old associations expire faster. Default 259200 seconds (3 days). Do not modify unless you understand. See code: program_ranker.rs.
program_index.query_affinity_cooldown_description: Effect: Prevents excessive affinity accumulation from repeated launches in short time. Multiple launches within cooldown period count as one. Default 60 seconds. Do not modify unless you understand. See code: program_ranker.rs.
program_index.temporal_decay_description: Effect: Controls decay speed of temporal weight over time. Smaller values make temporal boost fade faster. Default 10800 seconds (3 hours). Do not modify unless you understand. See code: program_ranker.rs.
program_index.sorting_params_warning: Warning: Do not modify parameters unless you understand their effects! Changes may affect search result ranking accuracy. These parameters are tuned for the standard matching algorithm.

debug.title: Debug Page
debug.generated_keywords: Generated keywords (lowercase name, pinyin name, initial letter name, all uppercase letter name)
debug.search_failed: Search failed, please check the console for details
debug.partially_not_smooth: May not be smooth in some cases
debug.test_failed: Test failed, please check the console for details
debug.keyword_generation_failed: Keyword generation failed, please check the console for details

welcome.title: Welcome to ZeroLaunch
welcome.subtitle: A Windows application launcher that tolerates typos

shortcuts.bring_to_front: Bring the currently open window to the front

wake_app.title: Wake App
wake_app.description: Press Alt + Space to wake up the search box at any time

quick_search.title: Quick Search
quick_search.description: Enter app name, pinyin, or abbreviation for efficient matching

one_click_launch.title: One-click Launch
one_click_launch.description: Use arrow keys to select, press Enter to launch

personalize.title: Personalize
personalize.description: Customize your exclusive launcher in the settings

bookmarks.title: Browser Bookmarks
bookmarks.no_sources: No sources, click Auto Detect to add
bookmarks.hint: Each entry is a browser's bookmark file path. Once added, these bookmarks will be indexed in search results.
bookmarks.unsaved_changes_tip: üí° Your changes have been recorded. Click the "Save Config" button at the bottom to apply them
bookmarks.settings_placeholder: Currently only path configuration is needed. Bookmarks are automatically parsed as URL items and can be opened directly.
bookmarks.select_source: Please select a source from the left
bookmarks.all_added: All detected browsers have been added
bookmarks.custom_title_placeholder: Leave empty to use original title

settings.title: Settings
settings.please_save_first: Please save your changes before switching pages
settings.builtin_command_description: Enable or disable built-in commands. Disabled commands will not appear in search results

about.description: ZeroLaunch is an application launcher meticulously crafted for the Windows platform, dedicated to providing an extremely efficient and fast search experience, allowing you to find and launch needed applications instantly.
about.local_running_desc: Runs completely offline, does not upload any data, protecting your privacy and security
about.intelligent_search_desc: Supports full name, pinyin, fuzzy, and initial letter search with dynamic weight adjustment based on launch history
about.pure_function_desc: Focuses on application search, supports custom search paths and UWP application search
about.open_source_desc: Licensed under GPLv3, completely open source code
about.new_version_found: New version found: '{version}'. Please go to the project homepage to download.
about.latest_version: You are on the latest version.
about.welcome_language_tip: After changing the language, you need to reopen the welcome page to see the updated language content

shortcut.title: Shortcut Settings
shortcut.open_search_bar_tooltip: Shortcut to open the search window
shortcut.switch_to_everything_tooltip: Shortcut to switch to Everything mode
shortcut.edit_mode_entered: Entered edit mode, you can now set shortcuts
shortcut.reset_all_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset all shortcuts to their default values?
shortcut.all_reset_success: All shortcuts have been reset to default values

config_path.title: Configuration File Storage Settings
config_path.config_cache_description: Set to 0 to upload on every save

app_config.language_save_tip: Please save after switching language to apply changes
app_config.launch_new_on_failure: Launch new instance when waking fails
app_config.scroll_threshold_tooltip: When the number of search results exceeds this threshold, the UI will switch to scroll mode to avoid display issues
app_config.esc_priority_tooltip: Default behavior is to clear search bar first, then close
app_config.drag_window_tooltip: The program will remember its last position when reopened
app_config.wake_on_fullscreen: Allow waking window when in fullscreen
app_config.wake_fullscreen_tooltip: Difference from game mode: Game mode unregisters the hotkey so the game can receive it, while this option keeps the hotkey registered
app_config.follow_mouse: Window position follows mouse on wake
app_config.follow_mouse_tooltip: Only recommended when multiple monitors have the same resolution and scaling, otherwise, you may encounter adaptation issues
app_config.space_enter_tooltip: When enabled, the Space key acts like the Enter key, and you can no longer type spaces
app_config.log_level_tooltip: Set the application's log output level. Debug level outputs the most detailed information, Error level only outputs error messages
app_config.export_logs_tooltip: Export all log files as a ZIP archive

everything.sort_method_tooltip: Set the sort method for search results
everything.sort_threshold_tooltip: Only sort results when the count exceeds this threshold. Higher values can improve search speed
everything.result_limit_tooltip: Limit the maximum number of search results returned
everything.not_supported: Everything is not supported on this architecture

refresh_scheduler.enable_installation_monitor_tooltip: Automatically refresh the database when a new program is installed (monitors Start Menu shortcuts)
refresh_scheduler.monitor_debounce_tooltip: Time to wait after detecting file changes before refreshing, to avoid frequent updates
